title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Programming Fundamentals Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Within 4 weeks, learners implement 3 types of simple algorithms (linear search, binary search, factorial calculation) using basic Python syntax (variables, conditionals, loops, functions) and achieve 80%+ test case pass rates for each algorithm
Learners will be able to accurately explain code structure with ≥80% accuracy by analyzing worked examples
Learners will be able to diagnose program error causes with ≥70% accuracy by applying self-explanation techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
